Package peril.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileParser
    Defines the behaviour of an object that can parse a text file.
    MapWriter
    Writes the current state of the game into a text file so that it can be loaded at a later time.
    TextFileReader
    Reads a external text file.
    TextFileWriter
    Encapsulates the behaviour of writing text to a file.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LineType
    The strings that start the lines in a map files.
    SaveFile
    Holds the file names and text representation of the files that are used to save and load the game.
